title: What songs go for your favorite champs?
body: So, I was watching a youtube vid with a short clip of a song for every champ (at that time) and a lot were fun and fitting, but some didn't feel right, so I figured I could offer a chance here. If anyone would post a song or two for up to their top 3 favorites, that'd be cool. I'm thinking it would be fun to share some favorite songs for certain champs.

replies.body:
Braum. I've always liked the idea of Atlas Hands by Benjamin Francis Leftwich for him. 

I can imagine him trekking across the Freljord, covering up against the cold, trying to do the best he can for the people he meets, dedicated to fighting the battles they can't fight. He smiles for them, he laughs that old Braum laugh, but when he moves on, when the last village falls behind the last rise, he's alone. Nothing feels quite as good as home, and he misses it. And he misses _her._

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pyue2N1XZ0M

{{champion:80}} https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l5aZJBLAu1E

And not for playing a champion.  However, this song goes for every time I play against {{champion:17}}  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k76IGLi6jWI

Few years old but

{{champion:238}}: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R95KftL2H1g

This worked pretty well with Zed's older lore, but it's literally perfect with his updated lore.

Despite Kayn not exactly being "paranoid", the lyrics of the song still fit fairly well.
